name: Cyber Hyper Mega Ball
description:
Are you ready for the next big Cyber thing in Hyper Mega Ball?

No?

That's cool....

This is a tennis sort of thing. 
  • You try to hit the balls at the target for mad pointz
  • If you miss the ball and it goes behind you, you lose cyber health.
  • If this happen 3 times, you Cyber Die
  • Hit the "Trigger" button to slow down BALL speed
  • Hit one of the face buttons to bring up the MENU
